Articles.Content:
I've seen alot of diffrent crafts posted that had some really good fighter jet cockpits, in the style of the f-22's cockpit and the su-27/su-30/su-35. But after searching around for a while ive found no mod containing anything similar.

Are there any modpacks that include som good fighter jet cockpits or should i just stick to merging parts together with stock cockpits to make them look somewhat like good cockpits?

The Mettworks cockpit by Mettwurst is modeled on the F-104's cockpit. You can get it from my Reaching for the Clouds pack.

You can get a bubble canopy from Firespitter. You can get an F-16 cockpit from Nazari's special projects mod.
